recipe_name: Prunes with orange and vanilla yoghurt
author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the yoghurt with the vanilla seeds into a bowl and mix together well. Place the prunes and juice into a dessert glass. Add the orange juice and spoon over the vanilla yoghurt. Garnish with the sprig of fresh mint and serve.
ingredients: 150g/5¼oz Greek yoghurt,  1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped out,  ½ can of tinned prunes with juice,  ½ orange, juice only,  sprig fresh mint, to garnish
